idea-plugin.name: A+ Courses
idea-plugin.description: This plugin supports the educational use of IntelliJ (and its Scala plugin) in programming courses that rely on the A+ course platform, which has been developed at Aalto University. The plugin accesses programming assignments and automated grading services provided by A+ and otherwise enhances the student experience.
idea-plugin.change-notes: Adding the initial skeleton of the plugin.
